body.p: This version includes new standalone editors and some changes to the technology stack as well as providing critical security and known issue fixes.

section.title: Standalone editors
section.p: You can embedd the Standalone BPMN and DMN Editors in your application. The same editors used in both BAMOE Canvas and BAMOE Developer Tools for VS Code are available as standalone Javascript libraries that can be imported into any frontend web application. They are available in two separate libraries that can be installed from npm or downloaded from Passport advantage, see BAMOE 9.1 Download Document:

ul.li: @ibm/bamoe-standalone-bpmn-and-dmn-editors-classic : The classic DMN and BPMN Editors

section.p: For more information on using the editors, see DMN and BPMN Editors JavaScript Libraries
The following new versions are supported for the technology stack:
You can find the supported configurations in the following link: Supported Environments
For more information on IBM Business Automation Manager Open Editions version 9.1.1 download document, see BAMOE 9.1 Download Document.
